PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-09162008-05-09,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of the Honourable JOSEPH HANDLEY, of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of K. (Rai) Sahi, whose term will expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
